评论概述: Couldn't Be Any Prettier a Dress..
评论详情: This is a gorgeous dress, with the just the amount of detail to make it effortlessly elegant with heels or boots, or simply perfect for slipping on sandals and a floppy hat for the boardwalk night stroll after dinner on the beach. It is just a gorgeous dress and I love it so much!
This was a gift, and the recipient absolutely loved it. It fit perfectly.

评论概述: Need same dress but different color
评论详情: I like the dress but need in different color
Lovely dress, but the dye tan in spots the first time I washed it. Totally ruined. Looks like I got bleach on it but I didn’t. I have this dress in another color and it’s great!

The 'negative' first: The color in person is quite different from the photo, which I expected based on reviews. It's more of a purpley orchid color than the mauvey pink in the listing. Still beautiful and I think it suits me better than the color in the photos. It's also quite thin and will need a layer underneath to avoid showing undies!  I'm completely obsessed with this caftan!! It's SO beautiful and so comfortable. The fabric is so soft and weightless, and it really is lovely. I didn't think it would be flattering at all since it's so loose, but the way it drapes helps to highlight my waist, and adding a belt completely transforms it so you could more easily wear it out!  I never want to take it off, I definitely plan to get more colors in the future.

It is completely see through. However it fits well and has pockets! I had to wear shorts and a tank under it. It is well made and has a nice flow. I'm not Too happy with the neck line, I might modify it. The part behind the tie makes it hang weird.
I love this dress. The color is right-on and the material is light and airy.
I bought this as a beach cover up and it will be fine for that. It's too sheer to be worn as a dress and I don't find it soft enough to be a nightgown.

评论概述: Color not at all like photo
评论详情: Fuchsia color of the dress isn't at all like the photo.  It's maroon/grey and very unattractive.  I have bought three others of this same style and they were fine, especially for someone who isn't tall.  Just do not purchase fuchsia if you want pink - it isn't pink.
Nice dress but could be used to wear around the house, too.  Just fancy enough to make one feel pretty!
I love everything but the length.

评论概述: Bonito vestido su color muy lindos me quedo muy bonito gracias
评论详情: Me gusta es fresco la tela es suave bueno para llevar en este verano caliente 😃

Ordered “Fuchsia” which appeared a Dusty Rose (that I liked) in the picture, but was actually dark purple (that I didn’t care for) when it arrived so I sent it back. Easy return.  Got a different color, which was again way off from the pictured color, but okay. It fits perfectly and I usually wear a size 1X-2X. Might get more, I just won’t count on the colors being the same as those pictured.
Pretty embroidered top, nice and cool.

This dress is beautiful. I own several Sakkas tops and dresses. I purchased three of these in different colors at the same time. Two of them had holes in the pockets. Doesn't make the dress unwearable, but it's crazy that the stitching is so bad that the dress is unraveling even before it's worn. Sakkas quality used to be great. Lately, not so much. It's really hit and miss.
This dress was a gift for my 5'8" tall sister. She is really pretty in it. The color is rich, with embroidery. It hangs on the diagonal and flatters any figure.
My wife loves it and I think it's very nice
I love this dress. It is loose enough to allow me to breath. The embroidery along the top and sleeves and across the bottom is exquisite. I can't say enough about how much I love this dress.

Well unbelievable cool, light weight, easy hand wash, it posed in the dryer on light/medium heat dried for approximately 10 minutes came out of the dryer looking beautiful and I was able to put it right on and wear it, I received so many compliments on this dress. Great buy, Good quality!
Light weight and comfortable. The fit is good. I do not think it will last for a long time. I would buy again. Hot weather wear.
Just what I wanted ,something comfortable for a wedding and light,cool for summer dress. Color is so pretty.

UPDATE: I hadn't ordered one for a while; just received a new one. I can't believe how awful it is. The color is as drab as anything I have ever seen. It arrived in a wadded, wrinkled mess. If it didn't have the Sakka tag on, I would think this was a return. The size is half what it used to be, no longer a one size fits all. Sooo disappointed. I am revising the star to a '1'.  ORIGINAL: I love these. I use them as nightgowns. The fabric is very soft and comfortable as such. I will go outside in them to the mailbox or to the garden, but I would not feel comfortable going shopping in them due to the sheerness. I love that they offer such a variety of colors. I wash them using the hand wash cycle but they do tend to shrink up in height. Overall, I would recommend them.
Beautiful color. I selected rust. I did lightly hand wash before wearing and would recommend as some of the dye will rinse away. The dress is light and airy, pretty detailed stitching.
Pretty color, I got the purple, nice fabric, good construction.  Overall a great purchase!!
Disproportionate neck and shoulders.

评论概述: This wrinkles badly but a pretty color.
评论详情: It will work good for what I need.

评论概述: Wore once it faded & shrunk. Even though I wore it once,  the shoulder seam is tearing apart.
评论详情: Cheap material, poorly built, waste of money.
This is the second dress I have bought. Same style different color. Comfortable, dressy yet still ablecto wear casually.

评论概述: Not long like in the photo. Unless you're 5' or less.
评论详情: very thin, very short

评论概述: It’s too sheer to wear without a slip and it’s much shorter than the picture shows.
评论详情: The fact that you have to wear a slip with this dress defeats the purpose of it being a summer dress. It is very sheer. I won’t wear a slip. And I wanted a dress that came to my ankles per the picture. This dress ends halfway down my calves. I will never wear this dress.

These dress products are nice, however, you have to be really really careful when you wash them. The color runs like crazy all over everything that's in the washer with the dress. I would never buy another one, I don't have time to wash them separately all the time.
Not my favorite dress,you may love it
Nice dress
I've seen water close to this color in certain sections of the Potomac back in the 60's, where algea blooms got out of hand from time.  But my dress is GREEN - Kelly green.
Runs large
Surprisingly dressier than expected. Very pretty fabric. Drapes well. Comfortable. Warmer than I thought it would be, but still light.

评论概述: I want to warn you that returns are not easy.
评论详情: Dress is thin and coloring was not even throughout. It looked like the color had not taken evenly and it wasn’t a attractive look.  It actually ruined it and the gray even looked green in spots- and that’s just looking at the front of the dress.

评论概述: Extremely elegant for casual or dress up
评论详情: This Caftan is so elegant and casual at the same time. Daytime I wear a flip flop and at night a heel with some jewelry, add a kimono to dress it up. It is sexy but yet modest, so comfortable and soft.  I get many compliments ! Sakkas makes summer so comfortable by making these lovely Caftans, sleeves, no sleeves- perfect!! Love this store!

评论概述: Love this! Second color ordered.  First one was the grey.  The second was aqua.
评论详情: The aqua was more of a green shade.  I have no complaint on the color as I love green.  I was looking for more of a blue tint though. I find the dress extremely comfortable.  I wrote a longer review on the grey one with more size info.  I will say that if you are petite or on the small side this might not drape well.  On their website they do have actual sizes if that is what you need.  Because others have indicated it did not wash well I will say that I washed this on a delicate cycle with other unmentionables.  I started to let it air dry along with my other items but I changed my mind.  I put it in the dryer on a regular setting and pulled it out about half way through the cycle.  There was nothing wrong with the fabric.  The seams were OK, it didn't shrink nor did it fade.  No ironing or steaming necessary.
Returned item... But dress color flow and fit was perfect for my body style...
I love this dress, it's so light  & airy

评论概述: Fits great, very comfortable, always rates compliments
评论详情: I really enjoy wearing this dress so much so, I ordered a second one.  I now have two, one purple and one gray. Each time I wear the dress I get compliments.  It was a great find for me.

I was disappointed by how high the side cut is. I was hoping for a less sharp cut, closer to ankle length. If you like high lateral cut, this is for you. Be aware of transparency. When light comes from behind, you’ll be naked.

Disappointed.  Fast shipping, but arrived heavily wrinkled and with a big rip around the neckline piping up by the shoulder.  Material is very thin yet feels stiff.  The sleeves are see-through.  Would be a tight fit around the bust-line for plus-size women.  Am returning.
This dress was too long and too tight.  Sent back for refund.
Love it!!! Fits perfectly & is beautiful. Received lots of compliments. Very confortable.
Nice enough, but ordered Teal…received a very bright Kelly green.
Not bad

Fit as expected (huge - it's a one size fits all), but the dye rubbed off on the little camisole I wore underneath (the dress is sheer and pretty see-through) and then the color faded dramatically the first time I washed it. (Yes, I washed it by itself, in cold, on the gentle cycle and I don't have an agitator in my machine). I'm very disappointed because, although it's not attractive (it's not meant to be), it's a super comfy dress and kept me relatively cool outside in the Texas summer heat.

I bought this dress in teal and loved how light and airy it was. Fit was perfect with lots of room. It was very comfortable and perfect for hot days. Then I bought the purple and the tan ones. The purple one was fine and fit like the teal dress but the tan one was tight in the arms. The neckline came up to my neck instead of mid chest like the other two. I had planned on purchasing more colors but after the way the tan one fit, I won't be buying any more.

评论概述: Beautiful, elegant & the common design.Wore it today in 108 degree heat. It’s sheer, but cool!
评论详情: Liked the fabric, feel, fit for 1 size was good in the  shoulders. Great color.
Cute and comfortable but unraveled with hand wash.
Delightful fabric. Light, comfortable. Soft colors, looks nice, fits well.

I bought this dress in 2 different colors. This one and the dark teal. 8 have copper hair and needed them to compliment. They are perfect. I am short and plus size. But this dress is both comfortable and whimsical.. I was very pleased in every way. Plus, POCKETS! I mean come one! Tell me that ain't a huge benefits. POCKETS!

评论概述: The craftsmanship of the dress is a bit poor.
评论详情: I love the dress. The only problem is that the islets came off on. I will keep the dress because I like it but have to modify the ties.
Fit perfect
The lacing n tie in bust adds a cute look.The lace sleeves are beautiful too.

评论概述: Not what I was hoping for
评论详情: I received my dress today and was a bit disappointed in it .its a beautiful color but not denim blue , more dark indigo blue. And no pockets in it as shown in the picture. Ill keep it as a house dress but its very thin and I know its going to bleed Ingo when I wash it. The material isn't as soft as some of the comments either. The fit was good tho. But really disappointed in the overall of it. I won't order anymore.

评论概述: It's BEAUTIFUL!! I have bought several but, the color and style! BEAUTIFUL!!
评论详情: Fits as expected, is tighter at chest but, my breast are hugh! Hopefully it will I can lose a bit, since summer is here!! 😂 I have several of these dresses, I have bought many the past month or so, in plans of summer weather but, I must say....this is my favorite of all!! It's beautiful!!! Love the color and, something about the lacey material (in upper part), really makes it look very feminine!! In a great way!!! You won't be disappointed!!

评论概述: Fucbsia is more of a deep purple color
评论详情: This dress looks more pink online, but it is still gorgeous and I am excited to add it to my collection!

I purchased this item for my big sister. I never purchased clothing for someone before, so I was fearful it wouldn't fit. I decided to get her this particular item, because I recalled a picture she took standing in front of The Berlin Wall before it fell. In that photo, she wore a green military jacket with a beautiful red scarf. Sakkas Egan's beautiful caftan was my tribute to that historic moment.
I liked this one so much I bought another one. Now I'm going to buy a third one.

I am 5’8” 130 lbs and I love the way the dress fits (I like my dresses loose). I’m a 32D and there is plenty more room for larger chests. Super comfortable. The only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is because it is slightly sheer (I could see my underwear through it), so I probably wouldn’t wear it out without some type of slip under it. But I think I might live in it at my house lol
I liked the dress and the color, but once again, the dress was WAY TOO SHORT on the sides.  So short that I had to return it.
It was wau more beautiful in person love it
I like how it fits and looks. Have not washed it yet.
Super comfy! I am recovering from surgery and needed a dress for a funeral. This dress helped me look nice while being comfortable.

评论概述: It's a great buy it's a great product
评论详情: I like this dress so much I had to order another one in a different color

评论概述: Love it!!!! Fits perfect. And i am going to purchase the others i have  in different colors.

This was the second dress I bought for my best friend in SC. She loves the fit, color, style so much she was wearing the first one all the time. So I bought the denim color. Just as thrilled. We’re both happy with this stylish dress.

评论概述: These dresses do not disappoint! Workmanship is extraordinary.
评论详情: Wore this for a Zoom meeting today. It made me feel pretty. Fit is perfect. I can't button or zip anything because of RA and I don't have to with these dresses. They are so gorgeous. We'll see how they hold up but so far 5 stars❗
Bad quality
This is significantly shorter than image suggests. I’m 5’7 and I was not expecting high-mid thigh - this is now just beach wear.

评论概述: The dress is pretty but does fit tight. But I'll have to keep it...
评论详情: because it cost half the price of the dress to return it. The material is see-thru. So, won't be wearing it out of the house. Don't know that i will ever wear it. But i will advise people that they better be sure about it before ordering, but it will cost to send it back.
Love it

I purchased 4 total dresses. 1 ok. 2 were very nice. One (olive green), was very high in the front and drags in the back. It looks very bad and cannot be worn in public.I asked for and was approved for a refund. I would have accepted a replacement.  HOWEVER, the seller requires me to PAY to return it.  I addressed this but received no response.
Love this dress!

Lovely dress, very happy with it. Just be sure to hand wash before wearing. The fabric will lose its funky smell and become quite soft then. Wash gently and separately, as the dye will bleed. I rolled it in a towel and laid it out to dry.
This is a one size fits all that actually does fit. I am short, so many things are too long, but this is a fine length. The color is pretty and the embroidery is lovely. I like this dress very much.
Nice dress

Very light weight and perfect for warmer weather. Loosely fitted so quite comfortable. Tapers to a v in the front and back bottom hemline, so the tip of the v is below the ankle. And the sides are higher than the ankle, about midcalf. It's cute!
This dress was just what I was looking for.  I wanted something long, but not dragging the floor.  I'm 5'3".  The color is sorta like a burgandy heather.  Very pretty!

This dress does not fit as portrayed in the photo. It should not be One Size.  It would probably fit very nicely for a 12 or 14 figure. The sleeves  came only about 1/3 of the way from my shoulder. It was not that full or flowing on me. I am 5’6”.  16/18 size and it just did not fit right on my frame. Such a waste of time to shop and then be disappointed. I think this line is made in India and would be beautiful for the more petite Indian woman.  I ordered two more styles from the same company that are to be delivered tomorrow. I’m not expecting to be able to use them either. I hope I’m wrong. It is such a hassle to have to order clothing online but I live in a rural mountain area so not much is available to buy locally.

评论概述: Too small and I returned it. Yet it is not shown on my orders my return or my refund!

I have 2 of these dresses so far. I’m very pleased with them
Love it
I love  everything about the dress/cover up. I will buy it in other colors.

These dresses are cheap junk. I bought 5 and paid $24.99 I feel so ripped off. The sleeves are not as pictured but short cap. The material is see through. They smell bad and one had a broken tie string. The colors are drab and faded. I know they will fall apart on first  washing & shrink up to nothing I’ve bought this type of dress at Ross before for $6.99. Don’t waste your money.The best one out of the five was the peach color but still way over priced. I don’t know who wrote the other reviews very strange.
I really like the dress. Fits to size The color is very pretty. It is very well made. Good purchase.
Love it!
Great fit nice length ,however if you are very tall it might be a bit short. Very well made and a nice color (gray).Very pleased with this purchase!!
The color was off from what I expected - more of a rusty reddish brown. I still have yet to wear it.....

评论概述: Perfect, even for us curvey women!
评论详情: This is my 3rd Sakkas dress and they are absolutely perfect. The soft, flowy rayon material lays beautifully.  They are casual enough for day, but dressy enough for night.  I am a 42D, so many "one size fits most" mostly don't fit me, especially across the chest, but these are comfortable and don't bind.  I can't praise them enough!  Sakkas is my new, favorite place to buy dresses.
It's a great designed and soft green colored dress, true to size. I liked the neckline and was comfortable with it not being too low or revealing.
It not the material I expected
I love these dresses for the summer. The one size is great. It looks better as I loose weight. Made very well and at an afforable price. I thank the seller for that.

评论概述: Unacceptable as a dress/OK for coverup
评论详情: The fabric is extremely thin and the drape is that of a swimsuit coverup perhaps, but I did not find it all attractive as a dress. Sent back.
I have gotten many compliments while wearing this dress. Cool and comfortable during the hot summer months:
Runs smaller and is shorter than pictured
If you want to look like a dowdy old lady, this is the dress for you. I AM an old lady, but I don't want to dress like one. Very disappointed.
